name: Dot.
overview: 8-year-old Dot is a ball of energy who launches herself into adventures and fearlessly sets about solving problems (which she most likely created herself) in the same way any 8-year-old would... by messing up a lot and laughing even more.

episodes.name: Bring the Thunder
episodes.overview: Dot tries to help her dog, Scratch, get over his fear of thunder.

episodes.name: One Soggy Knight
episodes.overview: Dot and the gang look for Scratch's missing chew toy.

episodes.name: Treasure Hunting Dot
episodes.overview: Dot finds treasure on a Geocache hunt.

episodes.name: Picture This
episodes.overview: Dot goes overboard making Mom an elaborate 'thank you' gift in the form of an animated movie starring Super Mom.

episodes.name: Scaremaster 2.0
episodes.overview: Dot and the gang give Mr. C. the "Scaremaster" a fright.

episodes.name: Ghoul Away!
episodes.overview: Dot tries to get rid of a ghost who moves into Mister Sherman's house.

episodes.name: Hello, Cello
episodes.overview: Dot has trouble playing the cello.

episodes.name: Dinner for Thirty
episodes.overview: Dot accidentally prints out a lot of dog bones.

episodes.name: Easy Squeezy
episodes.overview: Dot helps Hal with his lemonade stand.

episodes.name: A Dog's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Dot builds Scratch a robot companion.

episodes.name: Snow Day
episodes.overview: When Dot's grandmother Anne visits, she plans a snow day.

episodes.name: Leaf it to Dot
episodes.overview: Mr. C. takes Dot and Hal on a nature hike so they can earn their final Rangeroo badges.

episodes.name: A Song for Everyone
episodes.overview: Dot and her friends work together to write a song for the Winter Concert that will speak to the entire town, regardless of what holiday they celebrate, but their performance is threatened by a snow storm.

episodes.name: The Holiday Tree
episodes.overview: Dot is horrified to discover she's accidentally gotten rid of all the decorations for the town tree; she works around the clock to make new ones and discovers the joy that comes with giving and sharing.

episodes.name: Maker Breaker
episodes.overview: The festival of Maker Festival has come to town. Dot has trouble with her project for the kids' event and must realize that making something great takes time, and a lot of mis-steps.

episodes.name: Dog Doc Dot
episodes.overview: When Scratch hurts his paw, Dot becomes an over-protective helicopter parent.

episodes.name: Shallow End Hal
episodes.overview: Dot and Hal are excited to go swimming in the lake for the first time ever; while Dot learns to love floating amongst the fish and seaweed, Hal has a much harder time and makes the decision to stay on the sand.

episodes.name: Achoodini
episodes.overview: Dot gets a cold and can't attend Ruby's birthday party.

episodes.name: Dot, Unplugged
episodes.overview: Dot and her family participate in the National Day of Unplugging.

episodes.name: Scratch Says
episodes.overview: Dot creates a translator app so that everyone can understand Scratch.

episodes.name: Hal in One
episodes.overview: With his family mini-putt tournament looming, Dot volunteers to whip Hal into shape with an elaborate home course.

episodes.name: Rocket out of the Park
episodes.overview: Dot and her friends take part in the rocket building workshop at the Maker Festival, where Dot sees first hand how great it is that everyone does things their own way.

episodes.name: A Fishing Tale
episodes.overview: Dot buys Dad a hi-tech fish finder to help him finally catch a fish, but the gadget winds up getting them into trouble when a monster fish chomps onto it.

episodes.name: Gotcha
episodes.overview: Dot goes up against a crafty squirrel who's been stealing from her vegetable garden.

episodes.name: Garden Stakes
episodes.overview: Rangeroo Dot and Rangeroo Hal set-out to build a community garden in the hopes of earning their Build-It Badges, but wind up building something even more important: community spirit.

episodes.name: Slumber Party
episodes.overview: Dot is nervous sleeping over at Ruby Marshall's house but tries to hide it. She ends up comforting Nev, who also misses home.

episodes.name: Drama-Rama
episodes.overview: The gang puts on a backyard play and Dot goes overboard with special effects, putting the entire production in jeopardy.

episodes.name: What Goes Up Must Come Down
episodes.overview: When Dot traps Ruby's camera in a tree they both fling their shoes at it to try and get it down.

episodes.name: Big Help
episodes.overview: Dot and Hal are going for their Rangeroo Helper Badges, but have trouble finding a job that's big and "badge worthy" enough.

episodes.name: Butterfly Away Home
episodes.overview: Dot finds a caterpillar and takes him home to raise him into a butterfly, then has trouble letting him go.

episodes.name: Remembering Ogopogo
episodes.overview: Dot, Hal and Ruby work together to create a memorial video to help Nev and Dev deal with the loss of their pet goldfish, Ogopogo.

episodes.name: For Pet's Sake
episodes.overview: In addition to her dog Scratch, Dot is tasked with looking after Ruby's cat Meryl, Hal's fish Sir Gilderson, Nev's bird Zippington, and Dev's tarantula Waldo.

episodes.name: Dot's Boots Are Made for Walking
episodes.overview: Dot's family participates in a Rangeroo fundraiser for a special field trip, collecting donations for every step they take.

episodes.name: Lights Out
episodes.overview: When an electromagnetic storm makes viewing the Northern Lights from her own backyard a real possibility, Dot sets out to make it a sure thing by starting a "lights out" campaign.

episodes.name: Dance, Dot, Dance!
episodes.overview: Ruby is invited to Ruby's dance party, so Hal trains her to beat Move It Mania, then she finds out Ruby has Move it Mania 3.

episodes.name: Robo Racers
episodes.overview: Dot builds a spider Robot, Nev and Dev build a cheetah and Ruby and Hal build a frog. All their robots fail to pass the obstacle course, so they combine their robots into one and it completes the course.

episodes.name: Great Eggspectations
episodes.overview: When her parents get a chicken coop to avoid buying eggs, Dot names the three new hens Agatha, Princess Peck-Peck and Eliza-Bok. They're slow to lay eggs and Scratch chases them around the yard when the door is left open overnight.

episodes.name: Wish You Were Here
episodes.overview: Inspired by her growing collection of postcards from Nana, Dot decides to make a postcard of her own to send back to her.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Scratch Pad
episodes.overview: After a fallen tree branch destroys Scratch's doghouse, Dot decides to give him a major doghouse renovation.

episodes.name: Fast and Fabulous Fixers
episodes.overview: Dot decides to open a repair business, but she soon realizes that learning how to fix one thing doesn't mean you know how to fix everything.

episodes.name: Bad Borrower
episodes.overview: Dot's horrified to hear her friends consider her a "bad borrower", but when she loses Hal's digital camera she wonders if perhaps they're right.

episodes.name: Swap Bop
episodes.overview: Wanting to buy a flashy new toy, Dot and Hal try to raise the money with a garage sale, but things get hectic when they find out they traded away something valuable.

episodes.name: Best Friend Showdown
episodes.overview: Dot finds herself stuck in the middle of a best friend showdown between Hal and Ruby, each of whom claim to be Dot's true BFF.

episodes.name: So Much To Do, So Little Dot
episodes.overview: Wanting to spend time with all her friends, Dot spreads herself too thin and winds up spending time with no one.

episodes.name: Sticky Situation
episodes.overview: When no one shows up to her party, Dot assumes her friends don't want to be there and attempts to forge ahead with party fun anyway.

episodes.name: Souptacular Staycation
episodes.overview: Sad to be missing out on a trip with Mom and Dad, Dot instead goes on an interesting staycation with Nana and Hal.

episodes.name: The Shooting Star
episodes.overview: Dot and Ruby find themselves at odds when Dot is excited for Ruby to come to an astroclub meeting, but Ruby would rather be at a concert instead.

episodes.name: The Clean Team
episodes.overview: After forgotten trash gets in the way of their family beach day, Dot makes it her mission to solve the world's littering problem once and for all.

episodes.name: Snow Business
episodes.overview: Wanting to buy a new toboggan, Dot and Hal decide to earn the money by going into the snow business, but quickly find out that being an entrepreneur is more work than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Super Ruby
episodes.overview: Dot supports Ruby as she goes in to be fitted for brand new hearing aids where they meet a fascinating woman with a bionic arm.

episodes.name: One Trick Doggy
episodes.overview: Dot enters Scratch in a dog show, and goes a little overboard with her preparations.

episodes.name: Stop and Smell the Wild Roses
